info.title: Third Party API Integration

post.description: To push vehicle booking details to Sun Telematics server.

To push Update booking data to sun Telematics server.
 (Partner can ignore the Service)
Use this method to push the details of cancellation of the booking.

Use this method to get vehicle tracking details for current trip.

Note: partner_reference_number is Sun telematics bookingNo

Use this to get history tracking data for particular trip of booking. 

Note: Response of VehicleTrackingHistory will be in  list.
      partner_reference_number is Sun telematics bookingNo

To get tripend details once the journey is finished. Note
 that the trip will be “started” from the Driver app.
 
 > GPS data (lattitude and longitude) will receive based on Driver mobile App.
